package.name: libviso2
package.description:
This is a ROS-Package for libviso2, a library for visual odometry created by Andeas Geiger from the Institute of Measurement and Control Systems at Karlsruhe Institute of Technology.
Apart from the original libviso2 sources, this package contains a CMakeFile for easier integration into the ROS build system.
Please note that this code is licensed under GPL. For a commercial usage, please contact Andreas Geiger directly (see http://www.cvlibs.net/software/libviso2.html).
